title: BRIEF-Endeavour Says ‍Construction For Ity Mine Remains On-Time And On-Budget With First Gold Pour Expected Mid-2019​
text: February 23, 2018 / 12:54 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Endeavour Says ‍Construction For Ity Mine Remains On-Time And On-Budget With First Gold Pour Expected Mid-2019​ Reuters Staff Feb 23 (Reuters) - Endeavour Mining Corp: * ENDEAVOUR PROVIDES CONSTRUCTION AND EXPLORATION UPDATE FOR ITY MINE * ENDEAVOUR MINING CORP - ‍CONSTRUCTION FOR ITY MINE REMAINS ON-TIME AND ON-BUDGET WITH FIRST GOLD POUR EXPECTED MID-2019​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
